Name: The Quingenti
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Cognac with apple notes and a touch of herbal complexity by way of dry vermouth.
History: Created in 2008 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England, originally to celebrate the Future 500 initiative - quingenti is Latin for five-hundred.
Nutrition: One serving of The Quingenti contains 217 calories
